      • findSpawnLocation

        public static org.bukkit.Location findSpawnLocation(org.bukkit.Location startLocation)
        Attempts to find a suitable spawn location, searching from the startLocation specified. Note that portals are created if no position can be found.
        Parameters:
        startLocation - to find a spawn from
        Returns:
        suitable spawn location, or the input startLocation if this failed

      • findSpawnLocation

        public static org.bukkit.Location findSpawnLocation(org.bukkit.Location startLocation,
                                    boolean createPortals)
        Attempts to find a suitable spawn location, searching from the startLocation specified. If specified, portals will be created if none are found.
        Parameters:
        startLocation - to find a spawn from
        createPortals - - True to create a portal if not found, False not to
        Returns:
        suitable spawn location, or the input startLocation if this failed

      • rayTraceBlock

        public static org.bukkit.block.Block rayTraceBlock(org.bukkit.World world,
                                   double startX,
                                   double startY,
                                   double startZ,
                                   double endX,
                                   double endY,
                                   double endZ)
        Performs a ray tracing operation from one point to the other, and obtains the (first) block hit
        Parameters:
        world - to ray trace in
        startX - to start ray tracing from
        startY - to start ray tracing from
        startZ - to start ray tracing from
        endX - to stop ray tracing (outer limit)
        endY - to stop ray tracing (outer limit)
        endZ - to stop ray tracing (outer limit)
        Returns:
        the hit Block, or null if none was found (AIR)

      • rayTraceBlock

        public static org.bukkit.block.Block rayTraceBlock(org.bukkit.Location startLocation,
                                   org.bukkit.util.Vector direction,
                                   double maxLength)
        Performs a ray tracing operation from one point to the other, and obtains the (first) block hit
        Parameters:
        startLocation - to start ray tracing from
        direction - to which to ray trace
        maxLength - limit of ray tracing
        Returns:
        the hit Block, or null if none was found (AIR)

      • rayTraceBlock

        public static org.bukkit.block.Block rayTraceBlock(org.bukkit.Location startLocation,
                                   double maxLength)
        Performs a ray tracing operation from one point to the other, and obtains the (first) block hit
        Parameters:
        startLocation - to start ray tracing from, direction from Location is used
        maxLength - limit of ray tracing
        Returns:
        the hit Block, or null if none was found (AIR)
